name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: liChess Extension | Multiple Live Games on Homepage

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds support for all Live TV games on the LiChess homepage. Click to choose modes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to choose which live game mode to watch on lichess tv in the homepage.
